Nova.name: Snipe
Nova.description: Deals 310 (+4% per level) damage to the first enemy hit.

Nova.name: Pinning Shot
Nova.description: Deal 110 (+4% per level) damage to an enemy and slow it by 40% for 2.25 seconds.

Nova.name: Holo Decoy
Nova.description: Create a Decoy for 5 seconds that appears to attack enemies.   Using this Ability does not break Cloak.

Nova.name: Triple Tap
Nova.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 338 (+4% per level) damage each.

Nova.name: Precision Strike
Nova.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

Nova.name: Permanent Cloak, Sniper
Nova.description: Nova gains Stealth when out of combat for 3 seconds. Taking damage, attacking, using Abilities, or channeling reveals her.  Passive: Nova's Basic Attack range is 1 further than most other ranged Heroes.

1.name: Advanced Cloaking
1.description: While Stealthed, Nova gains 2 Mana per second and 25% increased movement speed

1.name: Covert Ops
1.description: After being Stealthed for 5 seconds, Pinning Shot's slow is increased to 55% and costs no Mana. Bonus is lost after losing Stealth for 1 second.

1.name: Longshot
1.description: Increases the cast range of Pinning Shot by 30%. Pinning Shot also increases the range of Nova's next Basic Attack by 2.

4.name: Covert Mission
4.description: Enemy Minions killed near you grant a stack of Bribe. Hero Takedowns grant 10 stacks of Bribe. Use 25 stacks to Bribe a Mercenary, instantly defeating them. Does not work on Bosses. Maximum of 100 stacks. If a camp is defeated entirely with Bribe, the camp respawns 50% faster.

4.name: Holo Stability
4.description: Increases the duration of Holo Decoy by 120%.

4.name: Rapid Projection
4.description: Reduces Holo Decoy's cooldown and Mana cost by 40%.

4.name: Remote Delivery
4.description: Increases Holo Decoy cast range by 100% and its sight range by 50%

7.name: Anti-Armor Shells
7.description: Your Basic Attacks deal 250% damage, but your Attack Speed is proportionally slower.

7.name: One in the Chamber
7.description: After using an Ability, your next Basic Attack within 3 seconds deals 80% additional damage.

7.name: Snipe Master
7.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe permanently increases the damage of Snipe by 15%. Stacks up to 5 times. All stacks are lost if Snipe fails to hit an enemy.

10.name: Precision Strike
10.description: After a 1.5 second delay, deals 456 (+4% per level) damage to enemies within an area. Unlimited range.

10.name: Triple Tap
10.description: Locks in on the target Hero, then fires 3 shots that hit the first Hero or Structure they come in contact with for 338 (+4% per level) damage each.

13.name: Explosive Round
13.description: Snipe also deals 50% damage to enemies near the impact.

13.name: Psionic Efficiency
13.description: Removes Snipe's Mana cost and increases its range by 10%.

16.name: Crippling Shot
16.description: Pinning Shot lowers a Hero's Armor by 25 for the duration of the slow, causing them to take 25% increased damage.

16.name: Lethal Decoy
16.description: Holo Decoy deals 40% of Nova's damage.

16.name: Perfect Shot
16.description: Hitting an enemy Hero with Snipe reduces the cooldown by 3 seconds.

20.name: Fast Reload
20.description: Triple Tap's cooldown is reset if it kills an enemy Hero.

20.name: Ghost Protocol
20.description: Activate to gain Stealth and become Unrevealable for 2 seconds. Your attacks and Abilities will also not break Stealth during this time.

20.name: Precision Barrage
20.description: Precision Strike holds 2 charges with a short cooldown.

20.name: Rewind
20.description: Activate to reset the cooldowns of your Basic Abilities.
